TI: [Connections between the nucleus lateralis dorsalis of the thalamus and the limbic system in man. Study of 12 anatomo-clinical cases of vascular origin].
AB: Lateralis dorsalis nucleus of thalamus belong to the limbic system of Papez more by its trigonal than cingular afferent pathways. Its parietal efferent pathways are probable, its cingular and trigonal ones possible but not proved. Neuropathologic studies provide informations to separate a latero-ventral part connected with parietal cortex and a mediodorsal part connected with limbic system.
TT: Connexions du noyau latero-dorsal du thalamus et du circuit limbique chez l'homme Etude de douze documents anatomo-cliniques d'etiologie vasculaire
